translation.en: [Michelle] How could you be so dumb, Tracy?
translation.zh: 你怎么能这么傻 崔希？

translation.en: No, I just cannot believe you agreed.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信你居然同意了

translation.en: [Tracy on phone] Well, it's easier for him.
I don't care if it's easier for him, it's homecoming.
translation.zh: 我不在乎这样对他来说是不是更方便 关键这是返校节

translation.en: Big deal, I'll meet him at the dance.
translation.zh: 没关系 在舞会上见就好了

translation.en: You're not going to meet him at the dance. Don't be such a dork.
translation.zh: 不要到舞会上见面 别傻乎乎的

translation.en: Well, then how do I get out of this?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我要怎么做？

translation.en: Look, just tell him that you're not going to go unless he picks you up.
translation.zh: 告诉他 除非他去接你否则你就不去舞会

translation.en: -I don't know. -[clanking]
You know, I think they're home. I gotta go, bye.
translation.zh: 我想他们到家了 我得先挂了

translation.en: Hi.
-Jerk! [laughs] -I'm sorry, I couldn't resist.
Come on, I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 跟我来 我给你看点东西

translation.en: How's the water?
-You think that's funny, huh? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 骗到你了吧？ 你觉得这样好玩 是吧？

translation.en: You think that's funny?
[chuckles] A little boy and a girl, how perfect.
I know.
So what does this guy do, anyway?
translation.zh: 这家男主人是做什么的？

translation.en: [Michelle] He makes money, lots of it.
Hey, come here, I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 到这里来 我给你看个东西

translation.en: How'd you like to see me in this for homecoming?
translation.zh: 想不想看我穿这个参加返校节？

translation.en: -I'd rather see you in nothing. -Mmm. [laughs]
Four hundred and eighty-five bucks, yeah, you're out of your mind.
-[whines] -You are.
But wouldn't you love to live like this?
translation.zh: 但你不想过这样的生活吗？

translation.en: Sure, who wouldn't?
-[car approaching] -Oh, my God. They're home! Go, go!
translation.zh: 天啊 他们回来了 快走！

translation.en: -Did you have a good time? -Yeah, thanks.
translation.zh: -你们玩得开心吗？-是的 谢谢你了

translation.en: Bill's ready to take you home, so, we'll just see you tomorrow, okay?
translation.zh: 比尔在外面送你回家明天见 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
-Everything go all right? -Yeah, fine. They're great kids.
translation.zh: -今天怎么样？-很好 他们都很乖

translation.en: Yeah, they are. They really like you.
translation.zh: 是啊 他们都很喜欢你

translation.en: -They talk about you all the time. -[laughs]
-So, you're what, a senior? -Yeah.
What are you going to do after graduation?
College. State, probably, unless I get a scholarship.
translation.zh: 上大学 可能是州大学吧如果拿不到其他奖学金的话

translation.en: You must be a pretty good student.
Mmm, athletic scholarship.
Swim team.
I've been competing ever since I was a kid.
And then what, after college?
I don't know. [chuckles]
You have to set goals for yourself.
translation.zh: 得给自己设立目标才行

translation.en: You got any real, solid goals?
translation.zh: 有什么实实在在的目标吗？

translation.en: -I don't know. [chuckles] -Yes, you do.
To live like you do, I guess.
translation.zh: 那可能是过上你这样的生活

translation.en: Well, just remember it's not so much what you have
translation.zh: 记住了 重要的不是拥有什么

translation.en: as who you share it with.
Mrs. Bartrand's really lucky.
translation.zh: 巴特兰太太真的很幸运

translation.en: Thank you. I'll tell you a little secret, though.
translation.zh: 谢谢 但我告诉你一个小秘密

translation.en: I'm the lucky one.
-[Michelle] Goodnight. -Goodnight.
Hey.
Well, I took your advice.
-Yeah? -And, uh, he blew me off.
No way!
God! He's such a punk!
Well, you know, I have my pride but no date for homecoming.
translation.zh: 我有我的骄傲 但返校节没男伴了

translation.en: Tracy, I'm so sorry. Do you hate me?
translation.zh: 崔希 我很抱歉 你恨我吗？

translation.en: No, no.
I'm so sorry.
Hey, he doesn't deserve you anyway, right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 不过他本来就配不上你 对吧？

translation.en: Hey, Stanley, you remember the once-great Detective O'Keefe?
translation.zh: 嘿 斯坦利 还记得以前了不起的奥基夫警探吗？

translation.en: Good afternoon, sir, how are you?
translation.zh: 下午好 先生 你好吗？

translation.en: Mr. Bartrand, how are you today, sir?
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生 你今天感觉如何？

translation.en: I am fine, Stanley. Never better, in fact.
translation.zh: 很好 斯坦利 事实上是好极了

translation.en: He's better than fine, he's lucky.
translation.zh: 他不只是很好 他是超幸运

translation.en: He beat me by two strokes.
You know, luck, luck had nothing to do--
translation.zh: 你知道 那和运气没关系

translation.en: -What can I get you gentlemen today? -The usual.
translation.zh: -今天二位想要点什么？-和平时一样

translation.en: -I'll have an iced tea. -Oh, come on, have a drink.
translation.zh: -我要杯冰茶-拜托 喝一杯吧

translation.en: I got to go into the office, I got some paperwork I got to do.
translation.zh: 我还得去办公室 有些文件要处理

translation.en: This is interesting. I'm looking at the 14th hole, which,
translation.zh: 有意思 我在看第14洞

translation.en: if memory serves, you scored, and next to your name I see a four.
translation.zh: 如果我没记错的话 你进球了我在你名字旁边看到了4分

translation.en: What'd you get Sally for her birthday? Huh?
translation.zh: 你给莎莉买了什么生日礼物？

translation.en: No, no, I tell you, you tell Norma, Norma calls Sally...
translation.zh: 不行 我告诉你了 你就会告诉诺玛然后诺玛给莎莉打电话…

translation.en: I swear to God I will not say a word this year.
translation.zh: 我向上帝发誓今年绝对不说出去

translation.en: Forget it. Suffice it to say,
it's something I think she's going to love.
I know I would.
You know what I hate about birthdays?
translation.zh: 你知道我讨厌生日哪一点吗？

translation.en: I can never, ever decide what to buy Norma.
translation.zh: 我永远 永远没办法决定 -给诺玛买什么-是啊

translation.en: And she gets so damn depressed on her birthday.
translation.zh: 然后她一到生日就特别郁闷

translation.en: Makes me sick.
-Really? -Yeah.
Sally too. She's been... She's been really moody this year.
translation.zh: 莎莉也一样 她今年真是喜怒无常

translation.en: I think it's the age thing.
-You think so? -Yeah.
I don't know, maybe. Look at her, she looks so beautiful.
translation.zh: 我不知道 看看她 还是那么漂亮

translation.en: -She looks fabulous. -I thought maybe it's 'cause...
translation.zh: 看起来美极了 我想也许是…

translation.en: she wants another baby. Like I would say no.
translation.zh: 她想再要个孩子 好像我会拒绝似的

translation.en: You guys trying?
Every chance we get.
[giggles] All right.
[Sally] How do I look?
Oh, wow, you look incredible.
translation.zh: 哇 你看起来漂亮极了

translation.en: Really? Do you think so?
-That dress. Oh. -Thank you.
Sorry I'm late.
[Jennifer] Daddy!
Hi, guys.
They're beautiful.
Shall we give Mommy her present?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Come on.
Okay.
-Come on, let's go. Come on, Michelle. -[Jennifer] Come on, Michelle.
translation.zh: -来吧 走了-来吧 米歇尔

translation.en: [Sally] I look forward to this.
Happy birthday!
You like it?
Does it matter?
[Kyle] Can we go for a ride?
Well, better yet,
how about we all go out to dinner in Mommy's new car?
translation.zh: 我们开着妈妈的新车出去吃饭吧？

translation.en: [Jennifer] Yeah!
Honey, I made reservations at the Wharf tonight.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我订了码头今晚的位子

translation.en: I thought you and I'd just have a nice quiet dinner, just the two of us.
translation.zh: 我以为你和我可以安静地吃个晚餐 就我们俩

translation.en: [sighs] I canceled.
I thought it would be more fun if we could all go someplace together.
translation.zh: 我想我们一起去某个地方会更有趣

translation.en: Okay. I'll go change, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我去换衣服

translation.en: [Sally] So, after tennis, they both have piano lessons,
translation.zh: 打完网球后 他们都要上钢琴课

translation.en: which Kyle's going to try to talk you out of, okay?
[laughs] Okay.
Okay, here, I wrote down the directions
translation.zh: 这里 我把路线写下来了

translation.en: and their music's on the piano bench
translation.zh: 他们的乐谱在钢琴凳上

translation.en: and I should be home around 5:00, really no later than 5:30.
translation.zh: 我应该会在5点左右回家不会晚于5点半

translation.en: -Great. -Thanks.
Okay, come on, kids. Time to go!
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 该出发了！

translation.en: [Bill] Okay, I'm leaving!
Hon, aren't you going to be early for your flight?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 现在去赶飞机是不是早了点？

translation.en: I got to stop by the office and pick up some papers I forgot.
translation.zh: 我得先去趟办公室 落了些文件

translation.en: Hey, look, can I call you back?
translation.zh: 嘿 能晚点再打给你吗？

translation.en: Okay, thanks, bye.
[Bill] Hey, buddy.
Okay, we're off.
Hey, you two, you be good, okay? Listen to Michelle. I love you.
translation.zh: 你们俩乖一点 好吗？ 听米歇尔的话 我爱你们

translation.en: [Bill] No, it sounds great but I'm running kind of late,
translation.zh: 不 听起来很棒 但我要迟到了

translation.en: so I'm going to give the phone to Sally
and you can work out the details with her, okay?
translation.zh: 你和她讲细节 好吗？

translation.en: -Would you give that to Sally? -Yeah.
Thank you.
The Griffins want to have dinner next week. Make it at the club.
translation.zh: 格里芬一家下周想一起吃晚餐定在俱乐部吧

translation.en: Hello? Hi, George.
Were you gonna leave without saying goodbye to your old man, huh?
translation.zh: -嗨 乔治-你们出去之前 不跟爸爸道别的吗？

translation.en: Love you. I love you. Get out of here!
translation.zh: 爱你 爱你 出去吧

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Yeah, we'd love to. Okay.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我们当然愿意 好的

translation.en: Hey, Doreen.
translation.zh: 多琳 我得回去一趟

translation.en: I got to run back to the house real quick, I forgot something.
translation.zh: 多琳 我得回去一趟 我落了点东西

translation.en: No problem, we've still got 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 没问题 还有20分钟才结束

translation.en: -Great, thanks. -[Doreen] Okay, ready?
translation.zh: -好极了 谢谢-准备好了吗？

translation.en: -[answering machine beeps] -[Bill over phone] Hi, it's me.
I'm in my car on the way to the airport and I just realized...
translation.zh: 我在去机场的路上 但我突然发现…

translation.en: [Michelle] Mrs. Bartrand? I forgot the kids' piano books.
translation.zh: 巴特兰太太？我忘了孩子们的乐谱

translation.en: Mrs. Bartrand?
-[Bill] ...I love you. -[answering machine beeps]
Ah, keys.
[man] I'll be upstairs.
I'm Detective Jacobs,
and I'm not going to ask you how you're doing right now,
translation.zh: 我就不问你现在感觉怎么样了

translation.en: 'cause I can imagine not so good.
Frank?
You didn't hear anything strange?
translation.zh: 你有没有听到奇怪的声音？

translation.en: Just Mr. Bartrand.
translation.zh: 只有巴特兰先生的声音

translation.en: At first, I thought he was here, but, um,
translation.zh: 一开始我以为他在这里 但是…

translation.en: then I realized it was just the answering machine.
translation.zh: 然后我意识到那是电话答录机

translation.en: He was leaving a message.
Detective Jacobs, this is Mrs. Bartrand, she's Bill's mom.
translation.zh: 雅各布斯警探 这位是巴特兰夫人 她是比尔的母亲

translation.en: -My condolences. -[Mrs. Bartrand] Thank you.
The children are asking to see Michelle, if that's all right.
translation.zh: 可以的话 孩子们在找米歇尔

translation.en: -Are you up to it? -Yeah, sure.
What the hell happened here?
Well, there's, uh, no signs of forced entry,
nothing seems to be missing. Looks like a suicide.
translation.zh: 好像也没丢什么东西 看起来是自杀

translation.en: What about the gun?
We're checking the registration.
translation.zh: 我们正在检查枪的登记号

translation.en: No note?
We haven't found one.
Next couple of days, Billy, are going to be real rough.
translation.zh: 比利 接下来几天可能会很难熬

translation.en: I'm not going to leave your side, all right?
So, anything you need, you ask me, all right?
translation.zh: 需要什么就告诉我 好吗？

translation.en: [Kate] Hello?
You know, she was fine, Frank.
It just doesn't make any sense.
Yeah, I know.
Yeah?
[Kate] The gun wasn't registered.
Did you know she had it, Mr. Bartrand?
translation.zh: 你知道她有那把枪吗 巴特兰先生？

translation.en: My wife hated guns.
She would never have allowed a gun in the house with the children.
translation.zh: 她决不会允许孩子们的家里有枪存在

translation.en: [Frank] Billy?
-Come on. It's okay, it's okay. -[Bill sobs]
translation.zh: 来吧 没事的 没事

translation.en: It's okay, it's all right, it's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 没事的 一切都会好的

translation.en: -[sobbing] -All right.
It's all right, it's all right.
Come on, it's going to be okay.
Michelle, there's somebody here to see you.
-Come on in. -Hi, Michelle.
translation.zh: 请进 嗨 米歇尔

translation.en: Can I get you anything, honey? Ms. Jacobs?
translation.zh: 需要什么吗 亲爱的？ 雅各布斯女士呢？

translation.en: Oh, no. No, thank you. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢 这样就可以了

translation.en: Call me if you need me.
Excuse me.
Michelle, there are a couple of questions I need to ask you.
translation.zh: 米歇尔 我有几个问题需要问下你

translation.en: Sure.
You're a swimmer?
I know this isn't easy.
I still can't really believe it.
translation.zh: 我还是很难相信发生的事情

translation.en: There are a couple of loose ends that I need to tie up, okay?
translation.zh: 我有几个不清楚的地方需要问下你 好吗？

translation.en: I listened to the message that Mr. Bartrand left his wife
translation.zh: 我听了巴特兰先生给他妻子的留言

translation.en: and in it, he said that things had been crazy that morning. Crazy how?
translation.zh: 在留言里 他说那天早上 有点疯狂 怎么个疯狂法？

translation.en: Just the usual family stuff,
translation.zh: 就是很平常的家庭琐事

translation.en: kids playing, TV, everyone was running late.
translation.zh: 孩子们在玩耍 看电视大家都快迟到了

translation.en: -They were both on the phone. -On the same call?
translation.zh: -他们俩都在打电话-同一个电话吗？

translation.en: No, um...
Mrs. Bartrand was on the patio phone
translation.zh: 巴特兰太太在院子里打电话

translation.en: and he was on his cell phone.
-Do you know who she was talking to? -No.
translation.zh: -你知道她在跟谁讲话吗？-不知道

translation.en: But he was talking to some friends who wanted to have dinner.
translation.zh: 但是他是和一些朋友他们想邀请一起吃晚饭

translation.en: How do you remember that?
Well, because I gave her his cell phone
translation.zh: 因为我把他的手机递给了她

translation.en: to set it up and then we all left.
translation.zh: 然后他们商量了这事之后我们就出门了

translation.en: So, "crazy" didn't mean they were fighting or anything like that?
translation.zh: 所以… “疯狂”不是指他们在吵架什么的？

translation.en: Oh, no.
I never saw them fight, not once.
translation.zh: 我从没见过他们吵架 一次都没有

translation.en: But then you hadn't worked for them that long, had you?
translation.zh: 但你也没为他们工作多久 对吧？

translation.en: Well, no, but you can just kind of tell about people, you know?
translation.zh: 没有 但是… 你可以从人身上看出来 对吧？

translation.en: They weren't the kind of people who would fight.
translation.zh: 他们不是那种会吵架的人

translation.en: So, Sally Bartrand seemed happy to you?
translation.zh: 所以在你看来莎莉巴特兰似乎很幸福？

translation.en: Yeah. She had a great life.
translation.zh: 是的 她过得很幸福

translation.en: I mean, everything you could want.
translation.zh: 我是说 拥有想要的一切

translation.en: It was perfect.
-No, I know. -Okay, yeah.
How far back do you guys go?
Oh, 20, 25 years.
We played football together in high school.
translation.zh: 我们高中就开始一起踢足球

translation.en: Billy?
Hey, Frank.
-You remember Detective Jacobs? -Hi.
Mr. Bartrand, once again, my condolences to your family.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生再次向你的家人表示哀悼

translation.en: Thank you.
I realize that this might not be the most appropriate time,
translation.zh: 我知道现在可能不太合适

translation.en: but was your wife under psychiatric care?
translation.zh: 但你妻子有在接受精神治疗吗？

translation.en: -Kate, let's talk about this later. -I'm sorry, of course.
translation.zh: -凯特 这个晚点再说吧-抱歉 是应该晚点再说

translation.en: Well, no, that's all right. Um...
[stammers] Well, she wasn't, but why do you ask?
translation.zh: 没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: The autopsy revealed traces of Danol in her system.
translation.zh: 尸检显示她体内有达尔诺的痕迹

translation.en: What's Danol?
[Kate] It's an anti-depressant.
Some users are prone to wild mood swings.
translation.zh: 一些服用者容易出现剧烈的情绪波动

translation.en: You didn't know your wife was taking it?
translation.zh: 你不知道你的妻子在服用它吗？

translation.en: No, I'm ashamed to say I didn't.
translation.zh: 不 很惭愧地说我不知道

translation.en: [sighs] You live with somebody for 12 years,
you think you know them.
translation.zh: 你会以为自己了解对方

translation.en: Let's go see the kids, huh, Billy?
translation.zh: 去看看孩子们吧 比利？

translation.en: I'll be back in a couple of minutes.
I'll see you later, Chris.
-You're going home? -That dog, Willie,
translation.zh: -要回家吗？-我的那只狗 威利

translation.en: more demanding than my last husband was.
translation.zh: 比我前任丈夫要求更高

translation.en: I need to speak to someone about Sally Bartrand's death.
translation.zh: 关于莎莉巴特兰的死 我有些事想说

translation.en: You can speak to me about it.
I'm Paul Richards.
I was Sally's lover.
[Bill] I found this in Sally's dresser,
translation.zh: 我在莎莉的梳妆台上找到了这个

translation.en: it was under a pile of sweaters. I mean, you know, it's unmarked.
translation.zh: 在一堆毛衣下面 上面没有标识

translation.en: I don't know if it's what you're looking for.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是不是你要找的东西

translation.en: All right, we'll check it out.
translation.zh: 好的 我们会送去检查

translation.en: It wasn't a whole lot of fun going through her stuff, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 翻她东西这过程可真叫人难受

translation.en: You know, sometimes life throws more crap in your face
translation.zh: 有时候生活会在你最难受的时候

translation.en: at the times when you can least afford it.
She ever mention a guy named Paul Richards?
translation.zh: 她提过一个叫鲍尔理查兹的人吗？

translation.en: I don't think so, no. Why?
translation.zh: 我想没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: Well, according to this guy, they were having an affair.
translation.zh: 根据这个人的说法 他们俩有私情

translation.en: -[sighs] -What?
The guy's a computer analyst from Southbank.
translation.zh: 那家伙是南方银行的电脑分析师

translation.en: He says he was out of town when it happened and, uh...
He just read about it in the newspaper when he got back.
translation.zh: 回来后在报纸上得知了此事

translation.en: And on top of that,
he says that she was about to leave you.
I'm sorry, Billy.
I wanted to be the one to tell you,
translation.zh: 我想亲自告诉你这些事

translation.en: I didn't want you to hear it from somebody else, you know?
translation.zh: 我不想你从别人那里得知

translation.en: So, she was just lying there all bloody when you found her?
translation.zh: 你发现她的时候她就浑身是血的躺在那里？

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, I would've lost it.
translation.zh: -是的-好吧 我会被吓死的

translation.en: You're not going back to work there, are you?
translation.zh: 你不会再去那里工作了吧？

translation.en: I don't know, I just... I feel bad for the kids.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我为孩子们感到很难过

translation.en: Now, wait a minute, he can find somebody else to babysit his kids.
translation.zh: 等一下 他可以找别人照顾孩子们

translation.en: Look, you're not going back there, Michelle.
translation.zh: 你不要再去了 米歇尔

translation.en: [sighs] Hi. I'm so sorry I'm late.
I had a hard time getting away from the office.
translation.zh: 我好不容易才从办公室出来

translation.en: Stanley, bring a carafe of the house Merlot, would you?
translation.zh: 斯坦利 给我来一瓶梅洛红 好吗？

translation.en: Right away, sir.
Since Sally's death, it's been difficult going to work
translation.zh: 莎莉死后 去工作就变得很难而工作的时候又…

translation.en: and then when I do, uh, um...
translation.zh: 去工作就变得很难而工作的时候又…

translation.en: Don't worry about it. I didn't mind waiting.
translation.zh: 别担心 我不介意等一会儿

translation.en: Thanks for meeting me here. Is this all right?
translation.zh: 谢谢你来见我 这样可以吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. This is great, Mr. Bartrand.
translation.zh: 是的 很好 巴特兰先生

translation.en: Mr. Bartrand was my father. Call me Bill.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生是我父亲 就叫我比尔吧

translation.en: So, um, how are Kyle and Jennifer?
They're okay. They...
Well, they miss you.
I miss them.
-How's school? -It's good.
I mean, it's homecoming so everyone's worried about getting their date.
translation.zh: 只是返校节要到了大家都在担心找不到同伴

translation.en: I mean, I'm sure that's not a problem for you.
translation.zh: 我觉得这对你来说应该不是问题

translation.en: Michelle, my mother's leaving soon, and...
translation.zh: 米歇尔 我妈妈就要回去了

translation.en: I was just hoping that you might be able to help us out,
just at least until things get a little bit more back to normal.
translation.zh: 至少在一切恢复正常之前

translation.en: Of course, whenever you need me.
translation.zh: 当然 只要你们需要我

translation.en: I mean, I know I have to hire somebody full time and I will, I just...
translation.zh: 我知道我必须找到全职保姆 我会的 只是…

translation.en: No, really, I don't mind.
Just give me a call. I'm available.
translation.zh: 需要就给我打电话吧 我都有空

translation.en: Thank you.
Sure.
Sally used to love coming here.
translation.zh: 莎莉以前很喜欢来这里

translation.en: [sighs] Life is so...
It can change in a heartbeat.
-Hi. -Hi.
Kids in bed?
I keep asking myself why I didn't see how much pain she was in.
translation.zh: 我一直在问自己为什么我没看到她有多痛苦

translation.en: [sighs] I wish there was something I could do to help.
translation.zh: 真希望之前我能做点什么

translation.en: The way you've been taking care of the kids has been an enormous help.
translation.zh: 你照顾孩子就已经帮了大忙了

translation.en: Which reminds me...
-Come on. -What?
-You'll see. -[chuckles]
Come on.
I want you to use the new car.
[Michelle] You're kidding, right?
My kids are all I have now,
translation.zh: 孩子们现在就是我的全部

translation.en: and when you drive around, I would like it to be in something safe and reliable.
translation.zh: 我希望你能用上安全可靠的车子

translation.en: You know, I'm totally cool with the station wagon.
translation.zh: 我完全不介意开旅行车

translation.en: Oh, no, please. It's old and it breaks down.
translation.zh: 不 拜托 那辆车已经很旧很破了

translation.en: Indulge me, okay? Press the button there.
translation.zh: 请迁就我一次 好吗？ 按这个按钮

translation.en: Go ahead.
Michelle!
This is sweet!
This is more like unbelievable.
Are you sure this was his idea?
translation.zh: 你确定这是他的主意吗？

translation.en: Yes, Mom. He trusts me, okay?
translation.zh: 是的 妈妈 他信任我 好吗？

translation.en: Michelle, you are 18 years old,
you do not need to be driving a car.
Not everything is about need, Mom.
translation.zh: 妈妈 不是每件事都与需要有关

translation.en: Some people, they just do things because they want to.
translation.zh: 有些人只是做着自己想做的事

translation.en: Give me a ride to school.
[Michelle] Jeff, you know, maybe you should ask Mom if you "need" a ride.
translation.zh: 杰夫 也许你该问下妈妈你是否“需要”搭个便车

translation.en: You lose the attitude, Michelle.
translation.zh: 收起你这态度 米歇尔

translation.en: I don't have an attitude, you do, okay?
translation.zh: 我没有 是你 好吗？

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry.
Do you want me to drop Jeff off at his school?
translation.zh: 你要我送杰夫去学校吗？

translation.en: Yes, yes.
This is going to make your life easier too. You know that, right?
translation.zh: 这也会让你生活轻松些 对吧？

translation.en: All right, all right.
For God's sake, be careful.
This car costs almost twice as much as what I make in a year.
translation.zh: 这车差不多是我一年收入的两倍

translation.en: I promise.
-[horn blaring] -Hey.
Girl, what'd you do? Steal this thing?
translation.zh: 你做了什么？偷走了它吗？

translation.en: He gave it to me to use. Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 他给我用的 你们相信吗？

translation.en: -What'd you have to give him? -Very funny.
translation.zh: 那你要给他什么？ 很好笑

translation.en: -Oh, it's even got a phone in here! -I know.
I'm not trying to be funny, Michelle. I'm serious.
translation.zh: -是啊-我不是在开玩笑 我是说真的

translation.en: Look, this guy just lost his wife, all right?
translation.zh: 听着 这家伙刚刚失去妻子 好吗？

translation.en: His whole world is a mess and I'm helping him out.
translation.zh: 他的世界一团糟 而我在帮助他

translation.en: This makes it easier, okay?
translation.zh: 这样会更方便 好吗？

translation.en: What do you want from me?
What does he want from you, Michelle? That's the question.
translation.zh: 他想要你怎么做 米歇尔？ 那才是问题关键

translation.en: -Hello? What's his problem? -[scoffs]
-I don't know but this thing is bad. -This thing is awesome. [giggles]
translation.zh: 我不知道 但这玩意儿太棒了 妙极了

translation.en: I was just looking for you.
translation.zh: 我在找你 （阿瑟顿警察局）

translation.en: Yeah, I'm out here feeding my habit.
-Yeah, so I see. -Where are you off to?
translation.zh: 是啊 看得出来 你是要去哪儿？

translation.en: I got to go let Willie out before he chews up the living room again.
translation.zh: 我得去把威利放出来免得他又把客厅搞得一团糟

translation.en: You treat that dog better than you treat me.
-He does more for me. -[chuckles]
-Listen. -Yeah?
I left the results from the lab test on Sally Bartrand on your desk.
translation.zh: 我把莎莉巴特兰的尸检结果放在你桌上了

translation.en: -Everything check out? -Not really.
What do you mean?
There wasn't any gunpowder residue on her hand.
Which means she was either wearing gloves when she shot herself,
translation.zh: 也就是说她要么开枪自杀时戴着手套

translation.en: managed to hide them after she was dead. That's a pretty neat trick.
translation.zh: 死后设法把手套藏了起来但这不是简单操作

translation.en: Those residue tests aren't 100% conclusive. You know that.
translation.zh: 你知道残留测试并不是百分百准确

translation.en: Yeah, I know that.
And I also know that Sally didn't kill herself.
translation.zh: 我也知道莎莉没有自杀

translation.en: Now, do you want to tell him or should I?
translation.zh: 你想亲自告诉他 还是我来？

translation.en: [Bill] Good one! Yeah, all right!
Beautiful, beautiful!
It's Uncle Frank. You guys carry on, I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 弗兰克叔叔来了你们继续 我很快回来

translation.en: -Okay. Got it? -Yeah.
Ready?
Kids seem better.
Yeah, yeah, I'm trying to spend more time with them.
translation.zh: 是啊 我在试着多陪陪他们

translation.en: Wish I'd done that when Sally was alive.
translation.zh: 真希望在莎莉还活着的时候我就这么做了

translation.en: Oh, boy. What?
What is it you don't want to tell me?
translation.zh: 你不想告诉我的事情是什么？

translation.en: The lab test failed to show gunpowder residue on Sally's hands.
translation.zh: 实验室检测没有发现莎莉手上有火药残留

translation.en: So, what does that mean?
Well, maybe nothing,
or maybe Sally didn't kill herself.
Oh, God.
I still think it was a suicide, Billy.
translation.zh: 我还以为那是自杀 比利

translation.en: But, uh...
Kate wants to check it out.
Right, okay.
I mean, we got to look at everybody.
We gotta look at this guy Richards,
translation.zh: 调查那个叫理查兹的家伙

translation.en: we got to look at you. You're the husband, you know.
translation.zh: 还得调查你 毕竟你是她丈夫

translation.en: And then there's the babysitter.
-Michelle? -Yeah.
I mean, how well do you really know her?
translation.zh: 我想说你真的了解她多少？

translation.en: Come on, Frank, you can't possibly think...
translation.zh: 拜托 弗兰克 你不能…

translation.en: Well, she had access to the house.
For example, she comes back,
translation.zh: 比如说 她回去之后

translation.en: she thinks no one's home, Sally surprises her,
translation.zh: 以为没有人在家 莎莉吓到她了

translation.en: she's stealing something. It happens all the time.
translation.zh: 她在偷东西 一切就这么发生了

translation.en: No, it's ridiculous.
She's... She's a good kid.
Well, she may be a good kid but you've got a serious situation here, Billy,
translation.zh: 她也许是个好孩子比利 但这结果可能很严重

translation.en: -and you can't afford to be too trusting. -[sighs] God.
Damn, okay.
-See you. -Yeah.
It wasn't suicide, was it?
No.
Thanks.
Is this where you guys would meet?
translation.zh: 这是你们见面的地方吗？

translation.en: Most of the time. It was safe.
translation.zh: 大部分时候 -这里很安全-要避开什么？

translation.en: From what?
Her husband. I told you, she was scared to death of him.
translation.zh: 她的丈夫 我说过你她怕他怕得要死

translation.en: You could've fooled everyone else who knew them.
translation.zh: 他可以骗过所有认识他们的人

translation.en: Oh, let me guess.
The perfect family, right?
[Kate] Was she under psychiatric treatment?
Are you kidding?
Bartrand'd never allow that.
The guy's a control freak.
Everything and everyone in their place.
translation.zh: 所有人和事都必须各就其位

translation.en: Sally wanted to get back to work since the kids were both in school.
translation.zh: 莎莉想过回去工作因为两个孩子都上学了

translation.en: You know what he told her?
That it was time to have another baby.
translation.zh: 是时候再生一个孩子了

translation.en: Bartrand says he didn't know about your affair.
translation.zh: 巴特兰说他对这段外遇不知情

translation.en: Of course he'd say that.
He knew.
In fact, Sally was sure he was having us followed.
translation.zh: 事实上莎莉确信他在让人跟踪我们

translation.en: Oh, really? Why would she suspect that?
translation.zh: 真的吗？她为什么这么认为？

translation.en: The way he acted.
Things he'd say to her after we'd been together.
translation.zh: 我们在一起后他对她说的话

translation.en: It frightened her to the point where one day she called
translation.zh: 这吓坏了她 以至于有一天

translation.en: and said it was too dangerous to see me.
translation.zh: 她打电话来说见我太危险了

translation.en: She broke it off?
[Paul] No.
Yes, but, you know, just for a while,
translation.zh: 好吧 但那只是一段时间 她想清楚之后我们就和好了

translation.en: until she could figure out what to do.
translation.zh: 她想清楚之后我们就和好了

translation.en: I loved Sally.
I wanted to spend the rest of my life with her.
No one remembers seeing you in West Palm the morning she died.
translation.zh: 在她死的那天早上没人记得在西棕榈见过你

translation.en: I wasn't interested in the speaker so I took a walk on the beach.
translation.zh: 我对演讲者不感兴趣所以我去了沙滩散步

translation.en: Anybody see you?
-I'm sure someone did. -Who?
You have a name?
You don't actually suspect me?
This is insane.
I'm the one who came to you people, remember?
translation.zh: 是我找上的你们 记得吗？

translation.en: I'm the one who told you she was going to leave him.
translation.zh: 是我告诉了你她要离开他

translation.en: But she left you...
Didn't she, Mr. Richards?
translation.zh: 不是吗 理查兹先生？

translation.en: [man on phone] Mr. Bartrand, I show no case under your name.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生 你名下没有任何案子

translation.en: [Paul] I'm sorry, I could've sworn I used your detective agency.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我发誓我用过你们这家侦探事务所的服务

translation.en: -No, it wasn't us but... -But what if--
translation.zh: -不 不是我们 但是…-但是什么？

translation.en: We keep very accurate files. You should try it.
translation.zh: 我们提供有详细文件 你可以找找看

translation.en: You're absolutely right, I should keep better records. It's just that I--
translation.zh: 你说得对我应该好好保存 只是我…

translation.en: [woman on phone] Securex Investigations.
Yeah, hi, it's Bill Bartrand
translation.zh: 嗨 我是比尔巴特兰

translation.en: and I've lost some of my files and I was wondering--
translation.zh: 我丢了一些文件 所以我想…

translation.en: Oh, yes, Mr. Bartrand, I remember you. This is Suzy.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生 我记得你 我是苏西

translation.en: -Suzy. -Uh-huh.
Yeah, Suzy, about that job you did for me a while back,
translation.zh: 苏西 关于之前让你们做的调查

translation.en: I seem to have misplaced my report.
I was wondering if you could send it over with any photos.
translation.zh: 我想知道是不是可以把它连同照片一起寄过来

translation.en: Well, it's been archived already but I could modem it over to your computer.
translation.zh: 报告已经存档了 但我可以把它发到你的电脑上

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, that'd be great.
Um, anytime you're ready.
I'll pull it up right now, Mr. Bartrand. I just need your case number.
translation.zh: 我马上调出报告 巴特兰先生 但我需要你的案件号码

translation.en: -Right, my case number. -Mmm-hmm.
You know, I'm not at the office right now
and I'll have to get back to you with it.
-No problem. -Thanks.
You're welcome.
I can't believe you're going to blow me off Saturday.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你周六要放我鸽子

translation.en: We were supposed to go shopping for homecoming.
translation.zh: 那可是要去买返校节需要的东西

translation.en: I told you, I have to watch the kids.
translation.zh: 我说了我得去照顾孩子

translation.en: Besides, why do you need a dress if you don't have a date?
translation.zh: 而且你都没有男伴了还需要新裙子做什么？

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, and whose fault is that?
[Kate] Michelle?
You're a very difficult person to connect to these days.
Oh, you know how it is, her being a working mother and all.
My friend with the mouth would be Tracy.
translation.zh: 这位是我话很多的朋友崔希

translation.en: -Tracy, Kate Jacobs. -Hi.
translation.zh: -崔希你好 我是凯特雅各布斯-嗨

translation.en: She's a cop.
So...
You've grown pretty attached to the Bartrand kids, huh?
translation.zh: 你和巴特兰德家的孩子变得很亲近了 是吧？

translation.en: Actually, um...
They've grown attached to me.
-Ever since, you know... -Sally's murder.
translation.zh: 你知道的 自从… 莎莉被杀之后

translation.en: Mmm, what?
You didn't know?
No... [gasps]
I mean, I was in the house and...
translation.zh: 我是说 我当时就在房子里

translation.en: Who would... Who would do that to her?
We don't know yet, honey.
That's why I want you to be careful.
You hear me?
Oh, my God.
What was that all about? What happened?
Hey, wait a minute. You can't go in there.
translation.zh: 等一下 你不能进去

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mr. Bartrand, I couldn't stop her.
translation.zh: 抱歉 巴特兰先生 我没能拦下她

translation.en: Oh, that's okay, Pam. This is Michelle, she's our sitter.
translation.zh: 没事 帕姆 这是米歇尔我们家的临时保姆

translation.en: What's the matter?
I don't think I can work for you anymore.
translation.zh: 我想我不能再为你工作了

translation.en: What?
What's going on? What happened?
That detective, Kate,
she told me that Sally was murdered.
translation.zh: 告诉我莎莉是被人杀害的

translation.en: She told you that?
But that's not true right? I mean...
translation.zh: 但那不是真的 对吧？

translation.en: No, Sally killed herself,
as hard as it is for all of us to accept,
and only Detective Jacobs is running around town looking for a killer.
translation.zh: 但只有雅各布斯警探在镇上到处找凶手

translation.en: Right.
You think I'd let you and the children
stay in that house for a second,
translation.zh: 你觉得我会让你和孩子们

translation.en: if I thought that was true?
translation.zh: 再继续待在那房子里吗？

translation.en: No, no.
I'm sorry.
Oh, she really frightened you.
Why would she think something like that?
I guess she can't believe that someone who had everything
translation.zh: 我想她只是无法相信 一个拥有一切的人会抛弃一切

translation.en: would just throw it all away.
translation.zh: 一个拥有一切的人会抛弃一切

translation.en: As for quitting,
I won't allow it.
Coming home to you and the kids
is just the best part of my day.
translation.zh: 是我一天中最开心的事情

translation.en: Why don't you give them dinner early tonight
translation.zh: 不如你今晚早点带他们吃晚饭

translation.en: and you and I,
we can have a late supper and really talk.
translation.zh: 我们可以吃个宵夜 好好谈谈

translation.en: Okay?
That'd be nice.
Bye.
Pam, get me Diane Watson on the phone, would you?
translation.zh: 帕姆 帮我接戴安沃森 好吗？

translation.en: [Pam] Yes, sir.
Hey, you're late.
Oh, my... You were making dinner tonight.
I cannot believe I forgot. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我忘了 抱歉

translation.en: Diane, this is our babysitter Michelle.
translation.zh: 戴安 这是我们家的保姆米歇尔

translation.en: Um, I'm just going to go upstairs for a minute.
Michelle, would you show Diane to the living room? Thanks.
translation.zh: 米歇尔 你能带戴安去下客厅吗？ 谢谢

translation.en: Um... I'm so sorry.
I didn't, um... God!
I didn't mean... I just...
translation.zh: 我不是故意的 我只是…

translation.en: You look beautiful.
I'm sorry that I hurt you tonight.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 今晚伤害了你

translation.en: Can you forgive me?
Can you?
I already made one mistake tonight. [stammers] I think...
translation.zh: 我今晚已经犯了一个错误 我想…

translation.en: We better stop this before I make another one.
translation.zh: 我们最好在我再犯错误之前停下来

translation.en: -[Bill] Frank? -[Frank over phone] Yeah?
-Oh, I'm sorry to bother you so late. -That's okay. What's up?
translation.zh: -很抱歉这么晚打扰你-没事 怎么了？

translation.en: Well, it's about the babysitter, Michelle.
translation.zh: 是关于我们家的保姆 米歇尔

translation.en: What?
Yeah, I just came home
and I found her going through Sally's things.
translation.zh: 发现她在翻莎莉的东西

translation.en: You're kidding.
She was even wearing one of her dresses.
translation.zh: 她甚至穿上了她的一条裙子

translation.en: Oh, man!
I don't know, maybe I'm making too much of it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许我想多了

translation.en: It's... Well, it's just after what you said, I...
translation.zh: 只是在你说了那些话之后…

translation.en: I thought you should know.
translation.zh: -我想你会理解-我很高兴你联系了我

translation.en: No, no, I'm glad you called me. Just be careful, Billy.
translation.zh: -我想你会理解-我很高兴你联系了我 -小心一点 比利-好的

translation.en: -Okay. Thanks. -All right.
Yes, I'm in.
Son of a bitch has it at home.
Michelle, Jeff's game has been rescheduled from 10:30 to 1:00
translation.zh: 米歇尔 杰夫的比赛从10点半改到1点了

translation.en: and I have to be at the hospital at noon.
Can you take him?
Oh, I can't. I have way too much to do today, Mom.
translation.zh: 不行 妈妈 今天我很忙

translation.en: I have to interview housekeepers all morning.
translation.zh: 我整个上午都要面试管家

translation.en: Interview what?
Housekeepers.
[scoffs] Exactly what do you know about housekeeping?
Who do you think runs that house, Mother?
translation.zh: 你觉得是谁在打理那一家子 妈妈？

translation.en: -I know what Bill and the kids need. -So, it's "Bill" now?
translation.zh: 我知道比尔和孩子们需要什么 现在叫他“比尔”了吗？

translation.en: It was his idea.
Like the car was his idea?
You're wearing heels to babysit?
Look, he asked me to do this
translation.zh: 听着 他拜托我做这件事情

translation.en: and I'm not going to show up looking like some teenager.
translation.zh: 我不想看起来像个不成熟的青少年

translation.en: You are a teenager, Michelle.
translation.zh: 但你就是青少年 米歇尔

translation.en: I'm sorry to stick you with this housekeeper thing.
translation.zh: 抱歉麻烦你操心管家的事情

translation.en: Do not worry about it. I have it all under control.
translation.zh: 别担心 一切尽在掌握

translation.en: -What would I do without you? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 没有你的话要我怎么办才好？

translation.en: -The skirt's a keeper, yes? -[giggles]
translation.zh: 穿这裙子就像个管理人 是吧？

translation.en: -Hey, have a good day. -You too.
Detective Jacobs, hi.
Mr. Bartrand, until you called me today, I thought you were avoiding me.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生 在你今天给我电话之前我都以为你在回避我

translation.en: I left so many messages.
translation.zh: 毕竟我留了那么多讯息

translation.en: Not at all. This hasn't been a great time for returning calls.
translation.zh: 怎么会 只是没找到合适的回电时机

translation.en: Forgive me.
Reason I got in touch with you today is...
translation.zh: 我今天联系你的原因是…

translation.en: If you have any questions about my wife,
translation.zh: 如果你有任何关于我妻子的问题

translation.en: I'd prefer you ask me and not the hired help.
translation.zh: 希望你直接问我 而不是找我的雇员

translation.en: Come on in.
You're a guy.
So are you.
[Kyle] I never knew guys wanted to be housekeepers.
translation.zh: 我没见过想当管家的男人

translation.en: This guy does.
Come on in.
Thank you.
You're supposed to wait there.
Great.
So, Mr. Bartrand, tell me about your marriage.
translation.zh: 巴特兰先生 说说你的婚姻状况吧

translation.en: It wasn't perfect.
We loved each other. We were happier than most.
translation.zh: 我们彼此相爱 我们比大多数人都幸福

translation.en: So, the neighbors just imagined the blow-ups,
translation.zh: 所以那些吵架 尤其是近几个月来的

translation.en: most of them within the past few months?
Oh, come on.
You know... I told you.
Sally wasn't herself. She was having these mood swings for no apparent reason,
translation.zh: 莎莉变得不像她自己 她总是莫名其妙地情绪波动

translation.en: and yes, sometimes there was shouting.
translation.zh: 是的 有时候会大喊大叫

translation.en: The Danol, no doubt.
Now that we know she was taking it, it does explain a lot, yeah.
translation.zh: 我们知道她有服用它这就能解释得通了

translation.en: In the real world, married people fight occasionally.
translation.zh: 现实就是夫妻偶尔会吵架

translation.en: But they don't all take lovers.
Is that why you killed your wife, Mr. Bartrand?
translation.zh: 所以你就杀了你的妻子吗巴特兰先生？

translation.en: Because she found someone else?
Are you finished insulting me? 'Cause...
translation.zh: 你的侮辱结束了吗？因为…

translation.en: I have a lot of work to do.
-Thank you. -Sure.
It was lovely to meet you, Mrs. Bartrand.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 巴特兰太太

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. -I'll see myself out.
translation.zh: -谢谢你来这一趟-我自己出去吧

translation.en: All right.
You're not Mrs. Bartrand, that was my mom.
translation.zh: 你不是巴特兰太太 我妈妈才是

translation.en: [sighs] Jennifer, come here.
Sometimes, it's just, um...
It's easier for me to say...
It's kind of hard to explain.
-Where's the man? -What man?
Kyle said there's a man maid here.
What are you doing in here?
Uh, just looking around.
Boy, this is some fabulous place.
Kind of a bitch to keep clean, though.
I know most people aren't too keen on male help,
translation.zh: 我知道很多人不太喜欢男雇员

translation.en: but just given the opportunity--
-I'm calling the police. -No, uh, no...
-[bangs phone] -Listen, please, uh...
My name is Paul Richards. I was a friend of Sally's.
translation.zh: 我的名字是鲍尔理查兹我是莎莉的朋友

translation.en: I know she didn't kill herself. Get out!
Please, listen to me!
Bartrand killed her because she was having an affair with me.
translation.zh: 巴特兰杀了她 因为她出轨了我

translation.en: Don't you see?
Get out now!
-Just let me pull up the document. -Get out!
[Bill] No, Frank!
Not tomorrow, now!
I want a restraining order out on this guy.
translation.zh: 我要对那家伙申请限制令

translation.en: [stammers] Look, Frank, just listen to me, listen to me!
translation.zh: 听着 弗兰克 你听我说！

translation.en: Please, look! Michelle is very upset here,
translation.zh: 拜托！米歇尔现在感到很心烦意乱

translation.en: and I think she has every right to be.
No, not... Look, not tomorrow.
I don't want this guy within ten miles of Michelle and the kids.
translation.zh: 我不希望那家伙出现在米歇尔和孩子们16千米内

translation.en: Do you understand?
All right?
Okay, all right. Thanks.
I just... [sighs]
I don't know what I would've done
translation.zh: 如果孩子们或你出了什么事

translation.en: if something had happened to the kids or to you.
translation.zh: 我真不知道要怎么办了

translation.en: It wasn't suicide, was it?
No, the police don't think so anymore.
translation.zh: 不 警察不那么认为了

translation.en: Detective Jacobs was right, then.
translation.zh: 那雅各布斯警探说的是对的

translation.en: [Bill] I wish I'd believed her...
translation.zh: 真希望之前就相信她的说法

translation.en: It just seemed so impossible
translation.zh: 只是当时看起来太不可能

translation.en: at the time, you know, so ridiculous.
That guy, Richards...
Why would he say that you killed her?
translation.zh: 为什么会说是你杀了她？

translation.en: I mean, you know, the police think he did it.
He's desperate.
He said there was some kind of proof or something in the computer.
translation.zh: 他说在电脑里 有什么证据

translation.en: I mean, there's... There's nothing on that computer
translation.zh: 那电脑里什么都没有 只有…

translation.en: but a couple of games for the kids and some household accounts. I...
translation.zh: 给孩子们的游戏 和一些家庭账户

translation.en: I got it for Sally but she never really learned how to use it.
translation.zh: 我给莎莉开的但她没有真正学会如何使用

translation.en: I'm scared, Bill. I mean...
It's just getting way too weird for me.
Look...
-I know. -[sighs]
I know. I'm really sorry.
-What if he comes back? -He won't.
Frank just told me
he thinks they have enough on him to arrest him soon.
translation.zh: 他认为他们掌握的证据足以很快逮捕他

translation.en: Do you think he did it?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得是他做的吗？

translation.en: [sighs] I...
He... He told them that...
That Sally broke the affair off a couple of months ago.
translation.zh: 莎莉几个月前和他分手了

translation.en: That he was still in love with her.
See, if she knew him, she would've let him in to the house.
translation.zh: 因为她认识他 她就会让他进门

translation.en: Do you want to go home?
Or...
Maybe you could stay here and just let me take care of you for a while?
translation.zh: 也许你可以留在这里让我照顾你？

translation.en: That'd be nice.
Good.
You get some rest and...
[sighs] I'll look after the kids, okay?
translation.zh: 我会照顾好孩子们 好吗？

translation.en: [Bill] Wake up, sleepy head.
Hi, Paul.
I just wanted to see what kind of man steals another man's wife.
translation.zh: 我正好想看看什么样的男人会抢别人的老婆

translation.en: I didn't steal Sally.
You lost her.
You wouldn't have kept her.
She was high-maintenance. And...
Look at you, you're strictly chump change.
translation.zh: 再看看你 你就是个傻瓜

translation.en: Hey, want to go play on the computer?
Let's put up the family photos.
Pretty please?
Well, you... You have been a busy boy.
Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah...
That's very good of you.
Scroll down, scroll down.
You know when I first saw these, I was...
translation.zh: 我第一次看见这些照片时 我…

translation.en: Understandably, I think, enraged.
translation.zh: 我想我的愤怒 可以理解

translation.en: I felt betrayed.
I felt...
Dirty, you know?
But the more I looked at them,
something happened.
It wasn't my wife anymore. It wasn't Sally.
translation.zh: 那不是我的妻子 那不是莎莉

translation.en: It was... It was like another woman.
I'd never felt
so much passion for anybody before.
The sex was
incredible, Paul.
And I have you to thank for that.
You're sick.
Delete it.
[Bill] Wake up, sleepy head.
-[chuckles] Hi. -Hi.
Feeling better?
Yeah, a little.
Maybe this will help.
translation.zh: 也许这会让你感觉好些

translation.en: I can't take this.
I want you to have it.
[Michelle] It's Sally's.
It's yours.
It's my way of saying
I love you.
This afternoon I realized just how much.
translation.zh: 今天下午我突然意识到…

translation.en: I don't know what I'd do if I lost you, Michelle.
translation.zh: 要是失去你我根本不知道该怎么办 米歇尔

translation.en: You're so beautiful.
Willie! Willie!
Willie! Willie!
-Boo! -[giggles]
-Hey, hey. -Hello.
So, what's the big secret?
-[laughs] -Come on, what?
He gave this to me last night.
Are you kidding me?
-And... -Oh.
He said he was falling in love with me.
The guy's got to be 40, Michelle.
translation.zh: 那家伙快40岁了 米歇尔

translation.en: You're sleeping with him, aren't you?
No!
[scoffs] Bull.
It's his money, right? I mean...
translation.zh: 是因为他的钱 是吗？

translation.en: You know what, forget it. I knew you wouldn't understand. Gosh.
translation.zh: 算了吧 我就知道你不会理解

translation.en: Um, you know, you're the one who called me over for this little show and tell deal.
translation.zh: 是你让我过来听你说这些的

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm sorry I did, then.
translation.zh: 好吧 抱歉我找了你

translation.en: I got to get ready for work.
[sighs] You know, I am so sick of you
acting like you're better than the rest of us.
translation.zh: 你总是一幅比我们更优越的样子

translation.en: Tracy, some of us have responsibilities.
translation.zh: 崔希 我有责任要负的

translation.en: No, I mean, if you want to play house with this guy, go ahead.
translation.zh: 不 我是说如果你想和这家伙过家家 随你

translation.en: But stop expecting me and everybody else to get excited about it.
translation.zh: 但别指望我和其他人会为此兴奋

translation.en: 'Cause personally, I think it's really weird
translation.zh: 因为就我个人而言我认为这真的很奇怪

translation.en: and kind of creepy.
You know, so does Danny.
You told Danny about my necklace.
translation.zh: 你告诉了丹尼项链的事？

translation.en: [sighs] Look, he asked me what was up with you lately
and, I mean, it just kind of slipped out. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我就说漏嘴了 抱歉

translation.en: You're sorry? That's it? That's all you're going to say to me?
translation.zh: 抱歉？就这样吗？你就只想对我说这个？

translation.en: [sighs] Forget it.
Tracy!
Hey! I thought you were my friend.
translation.zh: 嘿！我以为你是我的朋友

translation.en: Oh, no, you're way too mature for me.
translation.zh: 不 对我来说 你太成熟了

translation.en: You've got all your "responsibilities."
You know, the house, the car, the kids, the jewelry.
translation.zh: 房子 车子 孩子 珠宝

translation.en: You are so jealous.
[scoffs] Yeah, right.
At least he treats me with respect.
I mean something to him. I count for something.
translation.zh: 我对他来说很重要 我有价值

translation.en: He treats me like I'm an adult.
Who wants to be an adult?
You got to wake up, Michelle.
translation.zh: 你得清醒点 米歇尔

translation.en: Adults... Adults are old and boring.
Just like you.
[Michelle] Yeah, so are they. Mmm-hmm.
Yeah.
-[children] Hey, Uncle Frank. -Hey, kids.
Hi, remember me? Frank?
translation.zh: 嗨 记得我吗 弗兰克？

translation.en: Oh, right, hi.
How're the kids doing? Oh, they're doing fine.
We're actually meeting Bill here later for dinner.
translation.zh: 我们一会要在这里和比尔一起吃晚饭

translation.en: That's nice. All together, like a family, huh?
translation.zh: 真不错 一起就像家人一样 是吧？

translation.en: How are you doing?
Me?
Yeah.
Why?
I was just wondering.
Things are going pretty good for you lately, aren't they?
translation.zh: 你最近过得不错 是吧？

translation.en: You're driving a nice car, you're taking care of a nice house.
translation.zh: 开着好车 照看漂亮的房子

translation.en: You know, your friend Tracy tells me you're in love with Bill.
translation.zh: 你的朋友崔希说你在和比尔谈恋爱

translation.en: Is there any truth in that?
I said, "Tracy, no, that's not possible."
translation.zh: 我的回答是：“崔希 那不可能”

translation.en: 'Cause if it was...
That'd be just like stepping into Sally's shoes, wouldn't it, huh?
translation.zh: 就像是过着莎莉的生活 是吧？

translation.en: I want these put away and I don't mean on the floor.
translation.zh: 我是要你把这些收起来不是说放在地上

translation.en: Okay.
What's that around your neck?
-Um... -Where'd you get that?
Bill gave it to me, but I don't think it's real.
translation.zh: 比尔给我的 但我觉得不是真的

translation.en: This is way out of line.
I was going to return it.
I'll save you the trouble. Give it to me.
translation.zh: 我来帮你省去麻烦 把它给我吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Pam] Mrs. Winston is here.
Oh, show her in.
translation.zh: -喂-温斯顿夫人来了 让她进来

translation.en: Mrs. Winston, I'm so glad to meet you finally.
translation.zh: 温斯顿夫人 很高兴终于见到你了

translation.en: You have such a wonderful daughter.
translation.zh: 你有一个非常好的女儿

translation.en: I think so.
-Can I get you a cup of coffee? -I believe this is yours.
translation.zh: -需要喝杯咖啡吗？-我相信这是你的

translation.en: You're absolutely right. I...
I should not have loaned it to her.
It's just that she was admiring it,
and then she mentioned about the homecoming dance
translation.zh: 再加上她说起了返校晚会的事

translation.en: and I just thought...
Yeah, well, I mean, obviously I wasn't thinking.
Michelle tells me that you're looking for permanent help.
translation.zh: 米歇尔告诉我你在找长期帮手

translation.en: Yeah, but so far
I haven't been able to find anybody as wonderful with the kids as she is.
translation.zh: 我还没找到像她这么会照顾孩子的人

translation.en: She's...
She's really helped to keep their lives together.
I'm sorry for your tragedy, Mr. Bartrand,
translation.zh: 我为你感到遗憾 巴特兰先生

translation.en: but I have a daughter who has her own life
translation.zh: 但我的女儿还有自己的生活

translation.en: that she has to keep together.
I'll expect you to find a replacement by the end of the month.
translation.zh: 希望你能在月底找到替她的人

translation.en: Of course.
I've been thinking...
Maybe it's time to...
clean out Sally's things.
Her... Her clothes, her shoes.
translation.zh: 她的衣服 她的鞋子

translation.en: I don't know. It might upset Kyle and Jennifer.
translation.zh: 我不知道那样也许会让凯尔和詹妮弗不开心

translation.en: No, it's time.
It's time. We can't live in the past.
translation.zh: 是时候了 我们不能活在过去

translation.en: Not me, not the kids.
translation.zh: 我不能 孩子们也不能

translation.en: Do you think that you could...
[sighs] Just pack it all up and I...
I'll give it away to a charity.
Yeah, if that's what you want. Yeah.
I want us
to start our life together.
Close your eyes.
Close your eyes.
-Are they closed? -Yes.
-Still closed? -[laughs] No fair peeking.
There.
Now it's back where it belongs.
translation.zh: 现在它回到了它该去的地方

translation.en: Okay, come on, kids. Let's go!
translation.zh: 来吧 孩子们 走了！

translation.en: [children] Hi, Uncle Frank.
translation.zh: -嗨 弗兰克叔叔-嗨 弗兰克叔叔

translation.en: [Frank] I like your sweater, Michelle.
translation.zh: 毛衣很漂亮 米歇尔

translation.en: [whispers] I liked it on Sally, too.
-[laughs] Hi. -[Bill] Hi.
There you go.
Thanks.
That friend of yours followed me again.
translation.zh: 你那个朋友又跟踪我了

translation.en: -Frank? -[sighs]
Why would he do that? Come on, you sure?
translation.zh: 他为什么那样做？ 你确定吗？

translation.en: Ask the kids, they saw him.
translation.zh: 问孩子们吧 他们看见了

translation.en: -I thought you talked to him. -I did.
Then why is he still bothering me?
I did something... It may have backfired.
translation.zh: 我做了些事情 可能适得其反了

translation.en: I told him how much I care about you,
translation.zh: 我告诉他我有多在乎你

translation.en: and I think he might be having a hard time dealing with it.
translation.zh: 我想他现在可能很难接受

translation.en: Sally was his friend, too.
We need some time together, just the two of us.
translation.zh: 我们需要一些时间在一起就我们两个人

translation.en: I could have my mother come and take the kids for a weekend.
translation.zh: 我可以让我妈妈来带孩子们去过周末

translation.en: Would you like that?
I don't know. Maybe we should stop for a while.
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许我们应该先暂停下

translation.en: It just doesn't feel right.
You're the only thing in my life
translation.zh: 你是我生命中唯一对的存在

translation.en: that does feel right. Don't you know that?
translation.zh: 你是我生命中唯一对的存在 你不知道吗？

translation.en: -Look at this! I... -[clattering]
I just... I kept telling her I wasn't ready.
translation.zh: 我一直在告诉她我还没有准备好

translation.en: She's got the pendant, Billy.
All right, the friend saw it.
-I know. -Now, you say the word, I'll have her picked up.
translation.zh: 只要你一句话 我就把她抓起来

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
Tell Kyle and Jennifer that Daddy's having their babysitter thrown into jail?
translation.zh: 告诉凯尔和珍妮弗爸爸要把他们的保姆送进监狱？

translation.en: They... They've grown really attached to her, Frank.
translation.zh: 他们… 他们很亲近她 弗兰克

translation.en: You're not doing anything stupid with this kid, are you, Billy? Huh?
translation.zh: 你不会对这孩子做什么傻事吧 比利？

translation.en: No.
[chuckling] I mean, I wouldn't fault you if you were, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道 就算是那样我也不会怪你

translation.en: She's just as cute as a button.
Mmm, tell me about it.
But the kid's not playing with a full deck, all right?
translation.zh: 但那孩子还没准备好 好吗？

translation.en: So, I'm telling you. Get rid of her, now.
translation.zh: 所以我告诉你 现在就让她离开吧

translation.en: I think it's perfect,
With your hair up and these.
translation.zh: 把头发盘起来 还有这些

translation.en: No, Mom. These shoes, they cost more than the dress.
translation.zh: 不 妈妈 这鞋子比裙子还贵

translation.en: Oh, I love it.
Don't you?
Yeah. It's fine, it works.
translation.zh: 喜欢 很好 不错

translation.en: Homecoming. [chuckles]
Hey, Mom, um...
Tracy wanted to know if I could spend the weekend at her house,
translation.zh: 崔希问我这周末能不能去她家里

translation.en: because, you know, we're doubling.
And then Saturday, we were just going to kind of hang out.
translation.zh: 然后周六我们要一起玩

translation.en: Is that okay?
You're not working?
No, um...
He's going out of town on business
and their grandmother is watching them.
translation.zh: 孩子们的奶奶会来照顾他们

translation.en: [Alice] Oh, well...
Okay, as long as you make Tracy's mom promise to take pictures.
translation.zh: 只要你让崔希的妈妈答应拍照

translation.en: [scoffs] Please.
Hey, I'm a mom. What can I say?
translation.zh: 我是你妈妈 我能说什么？

translation.en: I'm going to buy you these shoes.
Mom, no. They're way too expensive.
translation.zh: 妈妈 不要 它们太贵了

translation.en: Oh, come on, let me. They're perfect.
translation.zh: 拜托 它们完美极了

translation.en: -Did you talk to Lieutenant O' Keefe? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: -你和奥基夫警督谈过了吗？-是的

translation.en: So, what's the problem?
He thinks you killed Sally Bartrand.
translation.zh: 他认为是你杀了莎莉巴特兰

translation.en: You know what your employer's been telling him?
translation.zh: 你知道你老板跟他说了什么吗？

translation.en: That he has caught you going through his wife's things,
translation.zh: 他发现你翻他妻子的东西

translation.en: wearing her clothes, her perfume...
translation.zh: 穿她的衣服 喷她的香水

translation.en: That you stole an expensive diamond pendant
translation.zh: 你偷了一条很贵的钻石吊

translation.en: pretty much like the one I see you wearing now.
translation.zh: 很像我现在看到你戴的这条

translation.en: Well, he... He gave this to me.
He also said you went through his wife's closet
translation.zh: 他还说你翻了他妻子的衣柜

translation.en: and threw away everything.
Yeah, well, he asked me to.
I mean, Frank's obviously lying.
Oh, is he?
And why would he do that?
Frank hates me because I'm not Sally.
translation.zh: 弗兰克讨厌我 因为我不是莎莉

translation.en: Oh, is that what Bartrand told you?
Well, Bill told him, you know, how much he cares about me
translation.zh: 比尔对他说了对我的在乎

translation.en: and then, I guess
he's just been having a really hard time dealing with it, you know.
I know Frank, Michelle. He's a good cop.
translation.zh: 我了解弗兰克米歇尔 他是个好警察

translation.en: He's not in the habit of trying to frame a teenager out of some personal vendetta.
translation.zh: 他不会因为个人恩怨陷害一个青少年

translation.en: But that's what he's doing to me.
No, dear.
Frank is not trying to frame you.
Bill Bartrand is.
Are you sleeping with him?
Michelle.
Michelle? I'm home!
Michelle?
Hey, the phone's ringing, dummy.
Hey, I thought you were going to Tracy's.
Where's Mom? I called her at work, she wasn't there.
translation.zh: 妈妈在哪儿？我上班时打给她 她不在

translation.en: She's at some training thing.
She left the number somewhere.
-Hi, Daryl. -Hey, Kate.
Oh, just the lady I came to see.
[Kate] I'm so lucky.
I, you know, I wanted to find out if anything had broken on the case
translation.zh: 我想知道这个案子有没有什么进展

translation.en: and then Frank suggested I let you know
if I was planning to leave town.
translation.zh: 如果我打算出城的话 最好先告诉你

translation.en: He didn't want you to think I was trying to escape the long arm of the law.
translation.zh: 他不想让你认为我是想逃避法律的制裁

translation.en: -Are you? -[chuckles]
Escaping?
Hardly.
I'm going to Tampa in the morning on business.
I had my secretary type out an itinerary, left it with the desk sergeant.
translation.zh: 我让秘书打了一份行程单交给了接待警员

translation.en: Very thoughtful of you.
I heard you filed a missing persons report on Paul Richards.
translation.zh: 我听说你提交了鲍尔理查兹的失踪报告？

translation.en: That's right.
Well, I want you to let me know the minute anything comes in on that.
translation.zh: 我希望你一有消息就通知我

translation.en: [scoffs] You know, anything we can do to make you happy, Mr. Bartrand.
translation.zh: 乐意为你效劳 巴特兰先生

translation.en: Yeah? Hey, Pam.
Yeah, yeah.
Mr. Bartrand?
Just a sec. Yeah?
Is that the phone you use in your car?
translation.zh: 这是你车里用的电话吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
So, you were on that phone when you tried to call your wife the morning she died?
translation.zh: 你妻子死的那天 你打电话给她时你也在用那个电话吗？

translation.en: Just a second.
Yeah.
Have a nice trip.
You know, Pam, I'll call him back.
[Bill] That sounds great, but look, I'm running late,
translation.zh: 听起来很棒 但我要迟到了

translation.en: so, I'm going to give the phone to Sally
and you can work it out with her, okay?
translation.zh: 你和她讲细节 好吗？

translation.en: Okay. Would you give that to Sally? Thank you.
translation.zh: 能把它给莎莉吗？ 谢谢

translation.en: The Griffins want to have dinner next week. Make it at the club.
translation.zh: 格里芬一家下周想一起吃晚餐定在俱乐部吧

translation.en: Hello?
[Bill on tape] Hey, it's me. I'm on my way to the airport
translation.zh: 喂 是我 我在去机场的路上

translation.en: and I just realized things were so crazy this morning
translation.zh: 我才注意到早上有点疯狂

translation.en: I forgot to kiss you goodbye.
So, I'll call you from the hotel tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我会在酒店给你打电话

translation.en: Gotcha.
Chris.
You get those cell phone records for me?
translation.zh: 你帮我拿到电话记录了吗？

translation.en: -I'm working on it. -Find Frank?
I paged him.
Uh, it's Willie time. -Yeah, yeah. -[busy signal]
Come on, Michelle.
-[Jeff] It's like a... -Hey. Get off!
I told you I was waiting for Mom to call.
translation.zh: 我跟你说了我在等妈妈电话

translation.en: -I... I got to go, okay? -[girl] Hey, call me later.
translation.zh: -我要挂了 好吗？-晚点再打给我吧

translation.en: Yeah, bye. What's your problem?
translation.zh: 拜拜 你是什么毛病？

translation.en: -Mom? -Michelle, honey.
I thought you were going to meet me at the house.
translation.zh: 我以为你会在家里等我的

translation.en: No, um...
You know what, I got caught
translation.zh: 知道吗 我被妈妈逮住了

translation.en: and my mom found out I wasn't going to homecoming.
translation.zh: 妈妈发现我不打算去返校舞会

translation.en: She grounded me.
Oh, well, maybe I should come over there and talk to her.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许我应该过去找她谈谈

translation.en: You know, tell her how badly I need you this weekend.
translation.zh: 告诉她这个周末我有多需要你

translation.en: You know, that's not a good idea 'cause she's really mad and, uh,
translation.zh: 你知道那不是个好主意因为她很生气 而且…

translation.en: she told me I can't work for you anymore.
translation.zh: 她说我不能再为你工作了

translation.en: Look, sweetheart, I'll think of something.
translation.zh: 听着 亲爱的 我会想出办法的

translation.en: It'll work out, you'll see.
I think she's coming, I got to go.
translation.zh: 她要过来了 我得挂了

translation.en: Michelle? I love you.
Hey! Are you really grounded?
Willie!
Now, how did you get out?
-[barking] -Oh, Willie!
[Michelle] I'm so glad you're here.
Homecoming?
Right. God, I forgot.
-[groans] -Am I surprised?
Look, I got to know something.
translation.zh: 听着 我想知道一些事情

translation.en: That cop, when he was talking to you,
why... why would he think that I stole the necklace?
translation.zh: 为什么会认为是我偷了项链？

translation.en: Because the guy told him it was missing.
translation.zh: 因为那家伙告诉他项链丢了

translation.en: He said that it... That it was missing?
Are the lights in the attic finally coming on, Michelle?
translation.zh: 你才知道吗 米歇尔？

translation.en: Did... Did you tell him that I had it?
translation.zh: 你告诉他项链在我这里？

translation.en: Yeah.
-It just kind of... -Slipped out. Right, I know.
-I'm sorry. -No, it's okay.
Are you...
You know, you don't look so good.
But you look amazing.
I'm so sorry for being such a--
Such a major bitch?
-That. -[both chuckling]
And more.
You know we're just going to the dance as friends, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我们只是作为朋友一起出席舞会 对吧？

translation.en: His date blew him off too.
How stupid was she? [chuckles]
Hi, I'm Bill Bartrand. Is Michelle here?
translation.zh: 嗨 我是比尔巴特兰 米歇尔在吗？

translation.en: Don't be home. Please don't be home.
Bill?
Bill?
-It's really frustrating, isn't it? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 这真的很令人沮丧 不是吗？

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
You smell good.
Here. Try this.
Here you go. Watch. Watch this.
translation.zh: （输入密码：安全调查） 就是这样 看啊

translation.en: There. Is that what you're looking for?
Yeah, take a look. Take a really good look.
-Look at that. -[Michelle whimpers]
[Bill] I sure know I did when I first saw them.
translation.zh: 我第一次看到他们的时候就知道了

translation.en: You killed her?
Well, of course I did.
-She was going to leave me. -[sobs]
She was going to take my children, my family.
translation.zh: 她要带走我的孩子 我的家庭

translation.en: No! Stop it! [whimpers]
-I thought you were grounded. -[sobbing]
No! No, please don't!
-[Bill] Here we go. -[Michelle crying] No!
No!
You know...
You're the best babysitter we ever had.
It's going to be really hard to replace you.
-Come on. -[groaning]
-[thuds] -Oh, that's got to hurt, huh?
Why are you doing this to me?
-Why not? -[gate slams]
Don't bother pressing the buttons, 'cause they don't work.
translation.zh: 别费心按按钮了 因为它们都不管用

translation.en: All right, Kate. Up you go.
Easy, easy.
You were right all along, Frank.
translation.zh: 你一直都是对的 弗兰克

translation.en: You tried to tell me. She's going crazy.
translation.zh: 你一直告诉我 她要疯了

translation.en: She tried to kill me, Frank.
translation.zh: 她想要杀了我 弗兰克

translation.en: I got two words for you, Frank. Amy Fisher!
translation.zh: 我必须告诉你 弗兰克

translation.en: This girl...
I had to do it, Frank!
translation.zh: 我不得不这么做 弗兰克！

translation.en: I had to do it! I...
I had to do it. [grunting] I...
Had to do it!
-[phone rings] -[Frank] Yeah? [Bill] Frank. Oh, thank God, listen.
translation.zh: -喂？-弗兰克 谢天谢地 听着

translation.en: I just walked in the door
and I found the babysitter trashing the place.
translation.zh: 我发现保姆把家里弄得一团糟

translation.en: -Can you get right over here? -Don't touch her, Billy.
translation.zh: -你能过来吗？-离她远点 比利

translation.en: -I'm on my way. -Great, thanks.
translation.zh: -我马上过来-太好了 谢谢

translation.en: Billy's got the sitter. I'm going to get some back-up.
translation.zh: 比利抓到保姆了 我得叫些增援

translation.en: [Bill] Michelle? Michelle?
Look what you did to me!
Michelle!
That's Sally's perfume, isn't it?
translation.zh: 那是莎莉的香水 不是吗？

translation.en: See, I'd know it anywhere.
You loved being her, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你享受成为她的感觉 不是吗？

translation.en: Didn't you?
Come on, let's get this over with before Frank comes.
translation.zh: 来吧 在弗兰克到之前结束一切

translation.en: Come on.
We're locked in.
We're all alone for the weekend.
Just like we planned.
Please.
[Bill] Michelle!
[woman over phone] Hello? Emergency operator.
Yeah, I'm sorry, operator. One of my kids thought this was funny.
translation.zh: 喂 我很抱歉我的孩子以为这样很好玩

translation.en: It won't happen again.
Please see that it doesn't.
translation.zh: -请告诉他这样并不好玩-谢谢

translation.en: [doll] Mama, mama.
[Michelle] No. Please. No!
Please, no!
Where you going, Michelle?
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿 米歇尔？

translation.en: Where you gonna go?
Around the back.
Drop the knife, Michelle.
-[Bill] Frank? -That's right.
Michelle, honey, come here.
translation.zh: 米歇尔 亲爱的 过来吧

translation.en: Frank!
What is it, Billy? Huh?
Frank...
You want to tell me a story, huh?
Oh, I love your stories.
Are you okay? You all right?
It's over, honey.
Get him a doctor and read him his rights.
translation.zh: 给他找个医生 然后宣读他的权利

translation.en: -Request an ambulance. -[woman over radio] Roger, a paramedic.
translation.zh: -叫救护车-收到 一辆救护车

translation.en: [Michelle] Wait.
There's something I don't need anymore.
[Bill groans] Frank!
[Kate] Michelle, come on.
[Bill] Frank!
Frank!
